[Becoming Steve Jobs *by* Brent Schlender](http://becomingstevejobs.com/) is a well-written biography of Steve Jobs & is definitely much better than Walter Isaacson’s ‘official' one! And yeah, it is much more than a boring compendium of wiki and news articles. :)

*So, happy reading!*
